levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attacks deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of Arts damage as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>; if target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@extra_ep_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental Damage
